body: To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to develop a TF fetish. The sexiness in it is extremely subtle and without a solid grasp of philosophy most of the porn would go over a typical viewer's head. There's also the escapist theme, which is deftly woven into the overall outcome of most TF sequences - the overall philosophy draws heavily from Impermanence literature, for instance. TF furries understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these themes, to realize that they're not just hot - they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike TF truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn't appreciate, for instance, the overall undying desire in the popular meme catchphrase "God I wish that were me", which itself is a cryptic reference to Aesop's classic fable "The Crow and the Raven". I'm smirking right now just imagining one of those normie simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as TF's genius ideologies unfolds itself in their computer screens. What fools.. how I pity them.
